author: Colleen Hoover
name: It Ends With Us
description: A powerful and emotional novel that explores difficult themes such as domestic violence.

author: Colleen Hoover
name: Heart Bones
description: A coming-of-age story about a young woman named Beyah who spends the summer with her estranged father.

author: Colleen Hoover
name: Maybe Someday
description: Tells the story of Sydney, who finds herself drawn to her neighbor, Ridge, a talented musician.

author: Mark Twain
name: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
description: This novel is a classic of American literature and follows the adventures of a young boy.

author: Mark Twain
name: The Prince and the Pauper
description: A novel set in 16th-century England, it tells the story of two boys who look identical.

author: Mark Twain
name: The Innocents Abroad
description: This book written by Mark Twain is a travelogue based on Twain's journey through Europe`.

author: Rudyard Kipling
name: The Jungle Book
description: A collection of stories set in the jungles of India, featuring Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves, and various animal characters.

author: Rudyard Kipling
name: Kim
description: A novel set in British-ruled India, Kim tells the story of an orphaned boy who grows up as a street urchin and becomes involved in espionage.

author: Rudyard Kipling
name: Captains Courageous
description: A novel about a spoiled rich boy named Harvey Cheyne who falls overboard from a transatlantic liner and is rescued by fishermen.

author: William Shakespeare
name: Hamlet
description: The book written by William depicts the story of Prince Hamlet of Denmark seeking revenge for his father's murder.

author: Mirza Ghalib
name: Diwan-E-Ghalib
description: A powerful and emotional novel that explores difficult themes such as domestic violence.

author: Jane Austen
name: Pride And Prejudice
description: A classic romance novel that explores themes of class, marriage, and social expectations in early 19th-century.
